charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Gari (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Gari (S) is a former member of the Hidden Rock Village's explosives corps. Edo Tensei Gari (S) has been summoned to do battle in the fourth great ninja war and he seems to be enjoying himself.

abilities.name: Exploding Palm
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Gari (S) uses Exploding Palm on one enemy. That character will be dealt 20 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability when they use a new offensive skill. This skill is permanent until triggered. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Ground Pound
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Gari (S) uses Ground Pound. The following turn if an enemy uses a new skill on Edo Tensei Gari (S) that character will be dealt 25 damage. Edo Tensei Gari (S) will gain 25% damage reduction for 2 turns and heal 15 health the following 2 turns. This skill is invisible until triggered.

abilities.name: Landmine Fist
abilities.description: Using Landmine Fist Edo Tensei Gari (S) deals 35 piercing damage to one enemy.

abilities.name: Explosive Taunt
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Gari (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
